drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: 10 fresh mint leaves, 1/2 lime, cut into 4 wedges, 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste, 1 cup ice, 1 1/2 fluid ounces white rum, 1/2 cup club soda

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: 2 oz Vodka 1 oz Cointreau 1/2 oz Cranberry juice 1/2 oz Fresh sour mix Lemon twist for garnish

drinks.name: Long Island
drinks.description: 1/2 oz vodka, 1/2 oz gin, 1/2 oz light rum, 1/4 oz tequila, 1/2 oz triple sec, 1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice or possibly to taste 6 oz cola or potentially to fill broken ice

drinks.name: Californication
drinks.description: 1/2 oz of vodka, gin, white rum and tequila, Freshly squeezed lemon juice, 1 oz Orange liqueur, 3 oz's fresh squeezed orange juice, Garnish with slice of fresh cut orange

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.description: 2 oz Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum, 1 Maraschino cherries, 6 oz pina colada mix, 2 oz pineapple juice, 1 pineapple quartered and sliced

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: 1 (6 ounces) can frozen limeade concentrate, 6 fluid ounces tequila, 1 oz Cointreau orange liqueur, 2 fluid ounces triple sec

drinks.name: Mai Tai
drinks.description: 1 oz light rum, 1 oz gold rum, 1/2 oz Orange Curacao liqueur, 1/2 oz orgeat syrup (almond syrup), 1/2 oz lime juice, 1 oz dark rum
